original_text: There were 1,760 priests and their relatives who returned. They were leaders of their clans. They were able to do their jobs well as they served God in his temple.
korean_text: 또 그의 형제들이니 종족의 가문의 우두머리라 하나님의 성전의 임무를 수행할 힘있는 자는 모두 천칠백육십 명이더라

sentences.original_text: There were 1,760 priests and their relatives
They were leaders of their clans
They were able to do their jobs well
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 일을 잘 할 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: as they served God in his temple
